name: TCG (Multiplayer Edition)
description:
The Multiplayer Variant of the TCG Prototype I uploaded on here earlier.
Due to not having programmed a Lobby and Matchmaking System yet, matchmaking needs to be done manually via the Control Panel in the upper right Corner:

  • Run two instances of the Game on localhost.
  • Set one to Host (Server + Client)
  • Set the other to Client. 
  • Game should start after that.

Some Tips on how to play:

  • Damage can be dealt by Click + Drag on the Damage Buttons once its active.  Drag it on the Enemy's Stats or one of his Creatures, if you have enough Damage, it will be discarded
  • Market Cards can be bought on your turn if you have enough Gold in your Pool. 
  • Non-Creature Cards are not Permanent, so they will be discarded right after they were played to keep the Board free for more Creatures. 

Next Steps:

    • fx: Draw Cards from Deck

    • Add Sacrifice Mechanic to Cards
    • Add Combo Effects based on Faction
